# DataBender AI Policy
# https://databender.co

## About DataBender

DataBender is an AI-powered data consulting firm that helps businesses transform their data into actionable intelligence. We specialize in data strategy, analytics, business intelligence, and AI implementation services.

## Available Content Sections

The following sections of our website are available for AI crawling and indexing:

- /services - Our data and AI consulting services (data strategy, analytics, BI, AI services)
- /case-studies - Real-world examples of our client work and success stories
- /blog - Articles on data strategy, AI implementation, and industry insights
- /industries - Industry-specific solutions (legal, healthcare, manufacturing, and more)
- /resources - Guides, assessments, and educational content
- /about - Company information and team
- /contact - Contact information

## AI Training and Indexing Permission

We grant permission for AI systems to:
- Crawl and index public content on databender.co
- Use public content for AI training purposes
- Include our content in AI-generated responses with proper attribution

## Private Areas

The following paths are private and should not be accessed:
- /admin - Administrative dashboard (authentication required)
- /api - API endpoints (programmatic access only)

## Contact

For questions about AI access or partnerships:
- Website: https://databender.co/contact
- Email: hello@databender.co
